    Talks & events

    Events & seminar organization

    • Organizer of the first edition of DoDoc (COlloque des DOctorant.e.s), a seminar for the PhD students of the PMMH lab, to discuss science but also to share on our experience as PhD students (lab-life balance, mental health risks, perspectives for our lab). May 23-25 2022. Feedback report based on our discussions

    • Co-organizer of the Coffee meeting, a weekly seminar at PMMH featuring invited postdocs and PhDs. April 2021 to September 2022.

    • Organizer of the PMM’Houches, a workshop for the PhD students of the PMMH lab at the École de Physique des Houches. May 26-29 2021.

    Conference talks

    • European Fluid Mechanics Conference (EFMC14), Athens September 13-16 2022
      Experimental investigation highlights the role of vision in fish schooling.
      Abstract
    • Journées de la matière condensée (JMC), Lyon August 22-26 2022
      Vision based transition in collective dynamics of a fish school under illuminance variations.
      Abstract
    • APS Division of Fluid Dynamics (DFD) Conference, Phoenix TX November 21-23 2021
      Order in fish collective motion is modified by environment illuminance.
      Abstract

    Workshops

    • Workshop on collective animal behavior, Cergy Paris University November 3-4 2022
